name: UnliMitosis
description:
UnliMitosis
Nanobots that heal us from cells that reproduce without control, you test, to recruit. Faced with unlimited growth, an army of nanobots of unlimited power responds.

Current nanobots can keep bad cells below 20%.

will you be accepted as the new healingNanoBot?
